Adds game-changing features such as:

How to Use:
1. Add this extension to Chrome.
2. Pin the extension by clicking the jigsaw piece at the top right of your Chrome window and then clicking the pin, next to "OnlyFans Toolkit".
3. Click the OnlyFans Toolkit icon on your extensions bar.
4. Click "Follow Expired", then the extension will begin indexing your fanbase and then follow those who have expired.
